entry.title: European Parliament Passes Bill Requiring Crypto Firms to KYC Non-Custodial Wallets

entry.title: The Best Ethereum Merge Explainer You’ll Ever See
entry.summary: The Ethereum Merge is the biggest story in town right now as the fruit of tireless core developers’ labour receives its final preparations before taking its place as the centrepiece of an enormous blockchain banquet. Will it blend seamlessly or will it burst asunder and make a horrible mess of everything?
